louvain.name: louvain
louvain.description:
Runs Louvain community detection algorithm.

Louvain works by iteratively maximazing modularity in each community, building hierarchy from the bottom layer (single nodes) up to the root layer. NOTE: Louvain may not return a result with a fully connected network as input.

Click here for more information

customParameters.name: --directed
customParameters.description: If set, input is treated as directed graph

customParameters.name: --resolution_parameter
customParameters.description: Guides number of communities the algorithm will detect. Higher the value the more communities detected.

customParameters.name: --seed
customParameters.description: Sets random number generator seed. Leave blank to not set.

customParameters.name: --overlap
customParameters.description: If set, generate potentially overlapping communities

customParameters.name: --deep
customParameters.description: If set, generate deep hierarchy, otherwise algorithm will just create clusters

gprofilersingletermv2.name: gprofilersingletermv2
gprofilersingletermv2.description: Uses Gprofiler to find best term below pvalue cut offusing a list of genes as input. For more information click here

customParameters.name: --minoverlap
customParameters.description: Minimum Jaccard value to allow for results

customParameters.name: --maxgenelistsize
customParameters.description: Maximum number of genes allowed in query

customParameters.name: --omit_intersections
customParameters.description: If set, skips calculation of gene intersections which makes operation much faster

customParameters.name: --maxpval
customParameters.description: Maximum pvalue to allow for results

cdenrichrgenestoterm.name: cdenrichrgenestoterm
cdenrichrgenestoterm.description: Uses Enrichr to find best term below pvalue cut off using a list of genes as input. For more information click here

customParameters.name: --maxpval
customParameters.description: Maximum pvalue to allow for results

customParameters.name: --genesets
customParameters.description: Gene sets to query. For options click here

clixo.name: clixo
clixo.description:
Runs CliXO community detection algorithm.

Original paper: Kramer M, Dutkowski J, Yu M, Bafna V, Ideker T. Inferring gene ontologies from pairwise similarity data. Bioinformatics, 30: i34-i42. 2014. doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btu282

A classical method that iteratively detects hierarchy based on cliques from changing edge weight threshold.
CliXO only works on graphs with edge weights.
NOTE: For reasonable runtime, the maximum size of input network should not exceed hundreds of nodes.

Click here for more information

customParameters.name: --alpha
customParameters.description: Threshold between cluster layers

customParameters.name: --beta
customParameters.description: Merge similarity for overlapping clusters

oslom.name: oslom
oslom.description:
Runs Order Statistics Local Optimization Method (OSLOM) community detection algorithm.

Click here for more information

customParameters.name: --singlet
customParameters.description: If set, do NOT merge singlet with existing clusters/modules

customParameters.name: --seed
customParameters.description: Random number generator seed. -1 means to not set it

customParameters.name: --p_val
customParameters.description: Increase for more clusters/modules

customParameters.name: --directed
customParameters.description: If set, infomap assumes directed links

customParameters.name: --cp
customParameters.description: Larger value leads to bigger clusters/modules

iquerysingleterm.name: iquerysingleterm
iquerysingleterm.description: Uses Integrated Query to find best term below pvalue cut off using a list of genes as input.

customParameters.name: --url
customParameters.description: Integrated Query REST endpoint URL
customParameters.validationHelp: Must be a URL starting with http

infomap.name: infomap
infomap.description:
Runs Infomap community detection algorithm.

A method based on Flux. Detect communities from dynamics on the network.

Click here for more information

customParameters.name: --directed
customParameters.description: If set, infomap assumes directed links

customParameters.name: --enableoverlapping
customParameters.description: If set, Let nodes be part of different and overlapping modules. Applies to ordinary networks by first representing the memoryless dynamics with memory nodes.

customParameters.name: --seed
customParameters.description: Sets random number generator seed. Leave blank to not set.

customParameters.name: --markovtime
customParameters.description: Scale link flow with this value to change the cost of moving between modules/communities. Higher for less modules/communities

hidef.name: hidef
hidef.description:
Runs HiDeF community detection algorithm.

Paper: TODO
NOTE: For reasonable runtime, the maximum size of input network should not exceed 20k nodes and 400k edges.

Click here for more information

customParameters.name: --k
customParameters.description: Persistence threshold. Increase to delete unstable clusters, and get fewer communities

customParameters.name: --ct
customParameters.description: Consensus threshold. Threshold of collapsing community graph and choose genes for each community

customParameters.name: --alg
customParameters.description: Choose to use Louvain or newer Leiden algorithm
customParameters.validationHelp: Must be set to louvain or leiden

customParameters.name: --n
customParameters.description: Target community number. Explore the maximum resolution parameter until the number of generated communities at this resolution is close enough to this value. Increase this number to get more smaller communities
customParameters.validationHelp: Should be either unset or a whole number

customParameters.name: --maxres
customParameters.description: Maximum resolution parameter. Increase to get more smaller communities
